html.problem:
CheckPoint: Angular Momentum of Point Masses
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
#Enter the computations here a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) m=lc_choose(a,0.06,0.15,0.24) L=lc_choose(b,0.8,1.2,1.5) o=lc_choose(c,0.8,2.5,4.8) A=50* m* L* L* o B=20* m* L* L* o C=10* m* L* L* o D=20* m* L* L* o E=10* m* L* L* o F=12.5* m* L* L* o
A light rigid rod of length 3L where L = $L m has small spheres of masses m = $m kg, 2m, 3m and 4m attached as shown. The rod is spinning in horizontal plane with angular speed \(\omega \) = $o rad/s about a vertical axis.
Find the magnitude of angular momentum of the rod in each case. Enter your answers in [kg.m2.s-1].
Part A. The axis of rotation is passing through mass m.
\(L=\)
Part B. The axis of rotation is passing through mass 2m.
\(L=\)
Part C. The axis of rotation is passing through mass 3m.
\(L=\)
Part D. The axis of rotation is passing through mass 4m.
\(L=\)
Part E. The axis of rotation is passing through the center of mass of the configuration.
\(L=\)
Part F. The axis of rotation is passing through the midpoint of the rod.
\(L=\)
